positive.review: My fav RTS ever? It's just brilliant in every regard - sound, gameplay, humor... It has it all and none of the other games in the series are anywhere near. This is "The Classic" for me.
Damn good game and time killer. Such a classic
I like that there are multiple facets to playing the game. Farming, Trade, Industry and of course, the skirmishes and strategy to defend your castle and conquer others.
I love this game, even tho i have 17 hours i really enjoy the campaign and custom games you can make, very fun, 10/10 would crusade again.

played a lot as as child
played recently
still fun
voice lines are great

The trail takes such a long time, but if you are up for it, it's a good challenge. It do have the more real time strategy feeling than regular Stronghold, however the bots do not always act logical and the experience may vary dependent on the map. Although storyline is boring the trail makes up for it. 10/10. This is the second time I finish the trail. 100 hours of my life I will never get back.
It was really entertaining back in the day and is still entertaining.
Best Stronghold ever. Highly recommended!
Best game I have ever played. 20 Years of ShC

The trail takes such a long time, but if you are up for it, it's a good challenge. It do have the more real time strategy feeling than regular Stronghold, however the bots do not always act logical and the experience may vary dependent on the map. Although storyline is boring the trail makes up for it. 10/10. This is the second time I finish the trail. 100 hours of my life I will never get back.
It was really entertaining back in the day and is still entertaining.

‚≠ê Stronghold Crusader HD ‚Äî Old But Never Forgotten

5 / 5

I first played this in the early 2000s, and somehow I‚Äôm still coming back in 2025. Few RTS games age this well.

üè∞ Crusader Extreme vs OG HD

Crusader Extreme adds massive troop counts and instant reinforcements, but it turns everything into chaotic spam. The original HD version is the real classic ‚Äî cleaner, balanced, and actually fun.

üéØ Campaign Trails

Fun, nostalgic, and sometimes ridiculously unbalanced. The difficulty curve makes no sense ‚Äî you breeze through one mission, then the next one feels impossible for no reason. Different maps, resources, terrain, and enemy setups keep it interesting, though.

‚öîÔ∏è Gameplay & Depth

You can play casually (build castles, chill eco, watch peasants work) or go deep into:

Unit counters

Eco efficiency

Tax/food/popularity balance

Optimized fortress layouts

Simple to learn, surprisingly deep to master.

üé® 2D Art & Atmosphere

The old-school 2D isometric style still looks amazing. You can see every villager and soldier moving around, and the game runs on any potato in 2025.

‚öôÔ∏è Details & Charm

You can choose different lord icons, which affects your starting troops. The voiced lord names (like ‚ÄúLord Vader‚Äù) are still iconic.

üß® Multiplayer

Online is a completely different beast ‚Äî high skill ceiling, crazy exploits, and fast eco/micro battles. Super fun once you learn the meta.

Verdict

Repetitive? Yes.
Addictive? Absolutely.
Some missions are unfair, but the core gameplay is timeless.

5/5 ‚Äî A true classic that refuses to die.

This game showed us what the best RTS games could be. I'm not afraid to say that not many have reached, let alone surpassed Stronghold's level.

[hr][/hr]

PROS
[+] Plenty of game modes (Historical Campaigns, Skirmish Trail, Custom Skirmish, Castle Builder, Map Gen.)
[+] Steam supported multiplayer
[+] Official Soundtrack
[+] SH Crusader Extreme included

CONS
[-] AI is pretty dumb and predictable after a while
[-] Buildings and [b] walls [/b] can be leveled with melee units

Bonus: Legendary quotes!
